data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Isoperla (Plecoptera: Perlodidae) from TIANMU MOUNTAIN NATURE RESERVE, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huo, Qing-Bo, Du, Yu-Zhou (2018): A new species of the genus Isoperla (Plecoptera: Perlodidae) from TIANMU MOUNTAIN NATURE RESERVE, China. Zootaxa 4504 (2): 276-284, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.2.8
